error.invalidColor: The color is not valid. You must use a hexadecimal value, a rgb value (in the format `(1, 2, 3)` or `[1,2,3]`) or [a color name from this list](https://old.discordjs.dev/#/docs/discord.js/main/typedef/Colors)
error.notFound: The message was not found: you need to use the command in the embed's channel.
error.textChannel: This command can only be used in a text channel

message_id.description: The message ID of the embed. You need to use the command in the channel of the embed.

error.notFound: The message was not found: you need to use the command in the template's channel.
error.notSend: The message was not send for an unknown reason.
error.textChannel: This command can only be used in a text channel

resend.name: recreate

error.administrator: Please, contact an administrator to edit the template.
error.attachment: Error while editing the template: the message has no attachment.
error.channel: Error while editing the template: message not found.You need to use the command in the same channel the template JSON was saved.

field.exist: Error while editing the template: the field `{{-field}}` already exist.
field.notfound: Error while editing the template: the field `{{- field}}` was not found.
field.tooMuch: Error while editing the template: the template has too much fields. You can't have more than 5 fields.

error.footer: Error while editing the template: the embed footer is not in the good format.

role.left: Can't remove the role {{role}} because it's the only one left.
role.notInTemplate: The role {{role}} is not in the template.

field.id: The id of the field, keep it short and simple. Use the field in the thread name with {{value}}
field.name: The field name
field.type: The field type, paragraph or short
